reviewText: I had to resume my workouts after 5 years of surgeries using the intermediate workout because my VHS tape for the basic workout unraveled and it wasn't available on DVD for the Performer.  I was so disappointed but I braved the intermediate workout pretty well.  I just don't do some of the harder exercises.  Love my Pilates Performer but would love to get the newer Reformer model with the workouts on DVD.

I already own the Basic workout and thought that I would like to try the Intermediate to further my workout progress. I was very excited to receive it, but other than 2 exercises...the tape was exactly the same! I feel that it was the biggest waste of money and that I was decieved!! Two thumbs down for this item!!Pilates Performer: Intermediate Workout
